title: D/c from pvp.net
body: ive tried everything from disabling ip helper to reinstalling nothing wants to work and its starting to get extremely annoying having the client d/c after every match. cant use chat and cant see after match history unless i go through my profile

replies.body:
Your disconnections could be caused by a number of local network settings, so I recommend ensuring your settings are aligned with those in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if your disconnections persist through those changes.

Like i have said above i have tried this already and nothing has changed ive done everything manually and more recently i downloaded the hextech repair tool or whatever it is called and i still frequently get d/c from the client. it doesnt affect matches just my chat outside of them. this is the only game i have issues with and for the life of me i cant figure out why because its not like my computer cant handle league :/

this is the error message not that it really help much but figured since someone always asks for it 
https://gyazo.com/cd7c4284a42b920abce97eac7978489a

In that case, we'll need to dig deeper to find a solution. I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). To expedite the process, run a set of logs with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to your ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.
